Welton <davidw@us...> - 2004-05-28 14:13:43 Update of /cvsroot/jungerl/jungerl/lib/ftpd/src In directory sc8-pr-cvs1.sourceforge.net:/tmp/cvs-serv31995/src Added Files: Makefile ftpd.erl Log Message: * src/ftpd.erl: Added ftpd module to jungerl repository. --- NEW FILE: ftpd.erl --- %%% File : ftpd.erl %%% Maintainer: <davidw@...> %%% Author : <tony@...> %%% Purpose : FTP SERVER (RFC 765) (must update to 959) %%% Created : 29 Jan 1998 by <tony@...> %%% $Id: ftpd.erl,v 1.1 2004/05/28 14:13:32 davidw Exp $ %%% Updates by David N. Welton <davidw@...> May 2004. -module(ftpd). -author('tony@...'). -compile(export_all). -export([start/1, start/0]). -export([init/3, control/2]). -import(lists, [reverse/1, map/2, append/1, foreach/2]). -include_lib("kernel/include/file.hrl"). -define(FTPD_PORT, 21). -define(FTPD_MAX_CONN, 40). -define(FTPD_LOGFILE, "ftpd.log"). -define(is_ip(X), size(X)==4, (element(1,X) bor element(2,X) bor element(3,X) bor element(4,X)) band (bnot 255) == 0). %% ftpd state record -record(state, { ftp_port = ?FTPD_PORT, %% port that ftpd listens on tcp_opts = [{active,false},{nodelay,true}], %% gen_tcp options max_connections = ?FTPD_MAX_CONN, %% max connections %% hosts allowed allow_hosts = [{{0,0,0,0},{0,0,0,0}}], %% all allowed %% hosts denied deny_hosts = [], %% none denied %% restricted users allowed allow_ruser = [anonymous,ftp,www], %% root directory rootwd = "", log_fd, %% log to file log_file = ""
